website_summaries.verdict: Great value for basic rubber golf grips because the set includes 13 grips and the tape you need.
pros: Classic pattern gives you just the right texture to maintain a secure grip
Grips work nicely in any kind of weather
Very low price for both the grips and the tape
Has lines on the grip so you can align your hands properly
cons: All-rubber design isn’t as soft as other types
These grips aren’t designed to last a long time

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on if you follow the directions. I suggest you mark the shaft first for the center line before taking off the old grips so you can easily align the new grips to the club
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Really Wanted To Like These
customer_reviews.text: Packaged wonderfully! Bottom line though....you get what you pay for. These look good, but are extremely underwhelming once installed and in hand. Another reviewer stated that he felt these are smaller than standard. I AGREE 100%. They just don't give me the stable feeling with my grip at the transition point of my downswing; as though the grip was "sliding in my palm". I really wanted to like these but will be cutting them off this week. I have my normally gamed crosslines enroute as I write this.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Applying the solvent correctly is critical.
customer_reviews.text: My clubs had lived in a bin in my motorhome for a couple years while i dealt with a couple health problems. That is all behind me now so it's time to play. Storage had dried out the grips. I found these SPALIZE grips and decided to give it a try. I screwed up the first one by not using enough solvent on the install.. You Tube also has a couple of great How-To videos and if this is your first try at this i highly recommend you watch. Have fun. I am very happy with the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I had never replaced grips and this kit had everything I needed with an informative video to explain the process from start to finish. The knife tool worked well for removing the old grips and I used a household solvent to remove the old tape before installing the new grips. This was the most tedious and messiest part of the replacement. I was worried that I would run out of the included solution but I didn't and had plenty left after using it liberally on each grip install. It took me about 10 minutes per club but more than half of that time was spent removing the old grip and tape.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Not the nicest grips but for the money I think it is well worth it most my set still has good grips but I have a few add on clubs that needed new way easier to install than I thought it be it was more difficult removing the old grips than it was to put these on. Took about 5 minutes a club once old grips were finally off the shafts. The grip don't adhere to the shaft instantly like the directions would make you think I had the grip fully on and was still able to move it a little bit to make sure it was set right before setting each club aside.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua N.

customer_reviews.title: Great grips, grwat price
customer_reviews.text: These grips are great. Not slippery when wet which is why I wanted to try them. Very comfortable I have large hands so the extra size makes me have a tighter grip without straining. The sight line up is great for me so I don't have to hope I am holding the club correctly. The only thing I would have liked better is that they came in oversize. Price is great several others in my golf league are going to get these when the regrip their clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to do even for a novice
customer_reviews.text: For me being a so so golfer I went to an hour 1 on 1 pro instructor & first thing he said “get new grips on your clubs”.After finding out the cost of getting them done by someone I chose to try it myself and I am truly happy with the results. It does take a bit of time to do, me doing it for the first times but following the video & instructions that came with these I am surprised how easily this was.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great grips for the price
customer_reviews.text: The grips were as described and were a great improvement over the worn out ones. They were easy to replace but I would recommend buying better grip tape than what was supplied. The tape worked well enough but there are better products out there which would make installation easier. Overall, I am very pleased with the purchas.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hadd

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip Kit For Any Level Golfer
customer_reviews.text: These grips came before they were expected so I was impressed out the gates. Everything that was listed was included so I could easily do the job. This was my first club re-grip and after realizing to liberally apply the solvent on the newly tapped shaft and on the inside of the new grips installation was a breeze. I did not use a table vise for the work. I purchased the midsized grips and the fit great in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: This set was great. I have no complaints. It had everything I needed and the process was pretty simple. This was my first time regripping clubs myself, and I was happy I went with this set since it made it so easy. The only tip I would give is use more of the solvent than you think you might need. It just helps the grips slide on that much easier. I did a whole set in about an hour. And it was my first time.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Klos

customer_reviews.title: not as easy as described
customer_reviews.text: these grips have a good feel and appear decently made, but they are not as simple to put on as described. to be honest, go to your local golf shop, pay the extra 15-20 bucks and save yourself the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Halvorson

customer_reviews.title: It's a complete package
customer_reviews.text: I am an occasional golfer with a set of clubs that had not been re-gripped for several years. Last time I paid someone else for re-gripping. The package had the cutting tool for removing old grips and adequate instructions for installing new ones. Not a difficult project but time consuming on some clubs to remove the old tape. The feel of new grips was great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dowsett

customer_reviews.title: Duffer!
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was incomplete; notified the seller and they stepped up with remaining pieces and 3 extra grips. Cannot say it has improved my golf game but is an extremely comfortable set of grips. Installation for the novice is mess but if you are prepared the install went great. Thanks for stepping up when the shipment was incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Great grips!
customer_reviews.text: Played my first round with these new grips on Sunday and was more than pleased with their performance. Excellent sight line options and great feel. Needed to upgrade to a mid-size grip profile and these grips were perfect. Super easy way to upgrade your sticks. Will be ordering a second set to upgrade my dads irons for Fathers day.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and easy to install. Best deal for the money. If you order this you don't have to go to the pro shop or golf shop to change your grip any more forever! It's so easy I can't believe it! It gives you the satisfaction of that you changed your own grip and you can brag it to your golf buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit and great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are not Winn or even Golf Pride but for the money, I was shocked at the quality. Years ago, when my wife and I made killer money, I had to have to best. Now, as retirement grows near, I search out deals. I will reorder more in the summer for sure!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grips. Easy to install with kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at half the price of other top brand grips. Easy to install after watching their video. Kit had everything I needed. (I bought a vise grip too.) First time I ever tried installing grips myself and it was a breeze. I'll never pay to have grips installed again! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product for price, good service, and expressed willingness to back up product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the tapes as I have used others before that were heavier and required complete removal of old tape even if it was still functional. This tape works great on top of old tape and also works sufficiently on clean or new shafts.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Native

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today and was looking forward to installing the new grips. Attempted two clubs and there were so flimsy I couldn’t get them on further than an inch or two. The red color also bled off onto my hands. Maybe I received a bad batch but these will be going back and I’ll be paying up for some nicer grips.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So far very good. I was concerned because some reviews had stated the color would bleed off onto your hands, but I haven’t seen any evidence of that happening, at least not yet!
customer_reviews.author: moez$

customer_reviews.title: Really nice grips
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable feel. The price is incredible! Have the feel of a much more expensive grip at a fraction of the cost. I like the fiber reinforced tape, too....removal of the tape will be much easier the next time I re-grip.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement grips that came with everything as advertised...I used a thicker two-sided tape after reading the reviews...made it a little bit tougher to slide on, but I got the job done and they work great...
customer_reviews.author: Unlike28

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a good value for around $30 as opposed to $100 or more having new grips installed at a golf shop. I've had some experience and am pretty handy working with my hands so I don't want to give the impression it would be easy for everyone. You will need a stationary vise and a rubber shaft holder to clamp the golf club in place along with a solvent to wet the grip interior and tape to slide the grip on. Instructions are included, the solvent and shaft clamp are not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it. Everything you need at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great feel. Great look.. Cant beat it for the price! Brace works great! Cutter is sharp. cant ask for anything else. Red and black grips look food!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: For the recreational golfer, these are just fine and for a great price. The kit is a bonus. Proper alignment takes a little time if you tend to obsess like I do. Would rather go with a 360* grip but they don’t offer them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D  Vernon, N.J.

customer_reviews.title: Took 29 strokes off my score. Or was that the eraser
customer_reviews.text: The good news is I got new golf clubs. The bad news is - there isn't any bad news. You'll think that you're playing with new clubs when you place up your old slicks with these mittens
customer_reviews.author: BTDun

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: If you watch the video installation is as it shows. I don't have expensive clubs nor a great golfer but these grips are every bit as nice as mine were new. Plus I went mid size which I now like better. I installed them on 10 clubs in about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and feel.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable grips. I had them professionally installed, and should have done it years ago. My clubs are nearly 20 years old, and I am far from anything but a recreational duffer, but I like how these feel.
customer_reviews.author: JasonDMcG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great customer service...
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review. The grips themselves are great quality and on par with my original grips. I had difficulty installing them as it’s very tough to do without a bench mounted vise and I ruined a few of the grips in the process of trying to install without the vise. The seller reached out immediately and their customer service has been great. I received a whole new set of grips free of charge as well as additional guidance on how to install them!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these on my clubs for around a month now. They grip good and sweat wipes off easily. Installing was a breeze with a little soap and air compressor
customer_reviews.author: Nuke Tech.

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy install for metal shafts- opening is very small.
customer_reviews.text: Installation video shows that this comes with solvent and a knife, but it does not. The opening is both very small and the rubber quite flimsy which makes installation on metal shafts a bit challenging (like pushing spaghetti!). I used a very small screw driver to assist and that helped. Overall the grips are a bit smoother than I had hoped, which has me concerned that with marginal use they will get slick.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Easy to install on your clubs. Removing the old tape is the worse part. Haha. Video how to link included! THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: NatEli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grip Kit
customer_reviews.text: Prefect grip kit, includes everything, except your elbow grease to removing the old grips also you need a rag and some kind of cleaner to help clean clubs before installing new grips. I would not use clubs same day.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Pitsch

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Every thing that I needed to re-grip my irons was there. I even like that there was a way to install the grips to set them up with a reminder grip to go by
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Use more solvent
customer_reviews.text: Great budget grip kit. The kit came with everything needed to regrip 13 clubs. The first few were a little difficult to slide into the shaft and I ended up getting a small blister on my hand, but after I started spraying more solvent, the grips were a lot easier to slide on. The solvent does cause some bleeding of the accent color which it why I went with white, so it wouldn't cause a noticable stain on my gloves.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: grips are much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how nice the grips were, thought they would be just something to practice replacing grips with. but thes e grips are as good as any you will find out on the market
customer_reviews.author: thomas conners

customer_reviews.title: Very good economical grips!
customer_reviews.text: Grips and tape bundle arrived as advertised. The are very good grips for a great price. Love that they come with tape. The grips took a little work to get on and lined up but not hard to discourage others from by. I would recommend them to the average golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: very nice grips
customer_reviews.text: love the grips. easy to install and comes with everything you need to install. removing the old grip tape is the worst part
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Easy job to perform with a big payoff
customer_reviews.text: This kit is truly complete. The pre-cut tape strips make this a really simple job. The old grip is easy to remove with the cutting tool. The only difficult part of the job is removing the old tape under the old grip. That does take a minute. The grips themselves are really nice for the price - nice to look at as well. If you are new to the process of regripping, you would be hard-pressed to find a better deal to learn the process.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to recondition old clubs
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how easy it was to replace my old grips. I like the look and feel of these new grips.
customer_reviews.author: rancher

customer_reviews.title: Nice grips
customer_reviews.text: When installing you must make sure to use enough grip solvent. Both on tape and inside of grip. The first one I didn't have enough in the grip and it stop half way on. Could not remove it and had cut it off. After that I made sure I had enough solvent and had no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just finished re-gripping my clubs. They needed it bad. Found these and figured i would give them a shot. Make sure you use plenty of the spray as they are quite tight. I almost wasn't sure if they would go on, but i guess that is better then them being too loose. All in all looking forward to taking them out and trying out the new grips.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you clean and lube really well.
customer_reviews.text: Through trial and error, we were able to install all the grips on our clubs - no easy task. However, when you really clean and really lube the shafts, you see the error of your ways. Once one, the grips make the clubs like new.
customer_reviews.author: jmycheck1

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I have installed many clubs, and never have I had issues , as with these grips, way undersized, and I'm possible to slip on, unless your the hulk. I'm returning, and go for a better grip, terrible product !
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swap grips
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Comes with everything needed to remove the old grips and install the new ones. Played well the next day. No issues. Would recommend. Much cheaper than getting a new set of clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P Mitcham

customer_reviews.title: Great price for good grips
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of these grips. The tape that came with them sucked to take out of the wrapping (the clear strips I think). Luckily I had some tape and that coupled with some solvent made for really easy installation. They have good feel. My only complaint was not being able to buy them in midsize. Once the snow melts I’ll see how they game.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to install as other brands, double sided tape was thicker than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has all you need.
customer_reviews.text: The kit had everything needed to install the grips. (Except the vise ) It was easy and they feel really good. The price was very good also.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Keough

customer_reviews.title: Replacement grips
customer_reviews.text: This kit had what was needed to install the grips. I liked the option of choosing a color. The blue is similar to what I had.
customer_reviews.author: Linette Tripp

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: ARRIVED AS PROMISED, EASY TO INSTALL. DURABILLITY WILL BE DETURMINED AFTER USE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: These grips are so soft, does not have stiffness needed to put it in the shaft and the diameter of the grip is quite short for the beggining part of the shaft, making it unable to put it. I just gave up. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, good quality. Easy install. Made well loved clubs like new again.
customer_reviews.text: When my16 year-old son ordered these to re-grip his own clubs, I was skeptical. He had no idea what he was doing. I watched as he layed it all out. He followed the instructions, and with-in 40 minutes he had a set of brand new looking clubs. He is thrilled with the look and the feel. They were hand-me-down clubs, so I'm thrilled with the money I saved.
customer_reviews.author: suzi O Bunks

customer_reviews.title: Good grips
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are awesome grips, easy to replace and the feel is good. If you never replaced your own grips before it’s easy and a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on clubs
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time getting these on my clubs but they fit fine and seem like a fair quality.
customer_reviews.author: H.B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lookin great grip
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, so far have only played three rounds. Great feel with them, went with oversize for my arthritis in the hands. Would have been nice to add solvent to the packaging
customer_reviews.author: Donna Saab

customer_reviews.title: quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and the look good. The kit came with everything I need. I put them on the next day. I have not had the chance to play with them yet. I will add to my review when I get a chance to play tomorrow. Played a round yesterday and they were just ok.... I expected a little more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, somewhat difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as easy to install as I thought it would be, maybe it was just my clubs. I eventually figured out that you need to really rub/work the spray into the adhesive and then spray it some more before trying to slide the grip on. Use rubber gloves and paper towels help you get a better hold of the grips to push them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with them.
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie, it took some time to install these, but they're very comfortable and worth the work.
customer_reviews.author: Apryl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only played one round of golf with the new grips so far but from what I can tell they’re amazing! And for less than $50 for the whole kit? Can’t beat it at all! Also my first time regripping clubs and it wasn’t hard to do at all. I’ll purchase again when needed and recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kory Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as some of the more expensive grips...
customer_reviews.text: These grips are great! Not just for the price either. They really are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for DIY grip changes
customer_reviews.text: These grips are super easy to install! Look and feel great! Use liberal amounts of solvent. I swapped out 8 grips in around 2hrs without using the vice holder. There is plenty of solvent so don’t be afraid to use to much. Clean up is easy
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Have installed many grips in the past. These grips slipped on without any problems. Only knock I have on these grips is how thin they were at the opened end, but it actually made it easier to slip over the shaft. Thinnest doesn’t seem to be a problem though, since the grip was pretty stable after the solvent dried.
customer_reviews.author: Fulton Jew

customer_reviews.title: The grips are really nice.
customer_reviews.text: The grips are perfect. The kit worked great to remove the old grips and apply the new ones. I am a female and was able to do it myself. Price was great and they came on time..
customer_reviews.author: Bedrock

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to golf pride
customer_reviews.text: Put them on recently and they feel great. Time will be the true test. The kit it came with had this amazing tool that was so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan C

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: After removing the old grip and taping the shaft, even with more than ample amount of solvent, the end is so flimsy it was impossible to push the grip further than 3/4 to 1" onto the shaft. I've regripped many clubs and never had this much trouble. I guess that's what you get for buying cheap. They're going back today.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Marko

customer_reviews.title: Great Grips.
customer_reviews.text: Great grips. Make my clubs look and feel like new.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice package with grip tape included Grips a little on the thin size but provide good “grip” when installed. Black and white pattern nice combo
customer_reviews.author: reddy golf

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, quality feel, an upgrade to old grips
customer_reviews.text: Could not be easier to install the grips. Hook knife made removing old grips a breeze. Highly recommend these, even if you never tried to do this yourself before.
customer_reviews.author: James Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Make clubs like new.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Made my clubs look and feel like new again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick The handyman

customer_reviews.title: Ready set go
customer_reviews.text: U need some strength and patience with these as u would any grip install but works great
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work great. Hopefully, they will last here in the hot desert. Very easy to put on too!
customer_reviews.author: Ann G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice an tacky and comfortable to grip..
customer_reviews.text: A bit thicker than I wanted, but adjusting to it nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value👍
customer_reviews.text: The solvent provided makes for an easy install. Overall... Im very pleased with the look and feel of the new grips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Fit nice easy to install and look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel K.

customer_reviews.title: Great grips👍
customer_reviews.text: Great grips very soft and supple. Never herd of the brand but will definitely buy these again. An outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Dannyswatch

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $$
customer_reviews.text: These grips are good for the pride point their in, an inexpensive way to regrip your old clubs.
customer_reviews.author: dennis j.

customer_reviews.title: You can do it yourself cheaper and better!
customer_reviews.text: Easy To install, and the directions are straight out of Golf Club Repairs For Dummies book!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne P.

customer_reviews.title: Great grips.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered extra quick. I like that i got the full kit. Much better than the grips i had put on at the club and a heck of a lot cheaper. Very good grips and excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: No need to look anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: I have never regripped clubs before, but my wife needed them in a hurry. Rather than pay $100s, I found this deal. EVERYTHING you need to do the job is in this kit. With the help of a friend, was able to regrip all clubs in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Titas

customer_reviews.title: grips
customer_reviews.text: good grips, good feel, nice package and all the stuff is there
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Repice

customer_reviews.title: Good value grip
customer_reviews.text: Fair amount of tackiness for a good grip. Good value grip for the price. Markings on grip allow for easier alignment during installation.
customer_reviews.author: Remcat jr

customer_reviews.title: Highly Rated - would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Great grips at an affordable price. Tried the tape provided with the clubs but was unsatisfied with the results. So I just used some tape we had laying around. Terrific grips and sized for standard shafts. Easily the best $25 bucks I’ve ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: mark prusa

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: My first time regripping my clubs on own. Watched the instruction video and everything was so easy! They look great and have not played with them yet so not sure about feel or comfort yet but so far a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good grips, lousy knife
customer_reviews.text: Great grips and feel. Easy to put on the clubs. Only negative was the tape is thinner then I usually use for my clubs, also the knife broke so I had to order a new one. Price is too good to complain.
customer_reviews.author: The Sabols

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for your money compared to similar grips...These grips came with everything you need to complete the removal and installation of your new grips plus detailed instruction...will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Really nice grips.
customer_reviews.text: These look nice on a set of golf clubs. Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: The grips seem and feel pretty nice. The instructions are pretty clear and you can also watch a video on YouTube for more instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EASY INSTALL!  LOOKS AND FEELS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: So unbelievably easy.... my Callaway grips were split and had been flapping around for a few rounds. I decided to research and order grips. I am so happy that I found these! Take off old... clean/prep club.... add tape and slide on grip. WOW!
customer_reviews.author: patrick gomulka

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Came with easy to follow instructions. The worst part is removing the old tape. Best thing I found is to use a razor blade to scrape it off
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. No real deviation from what it says in Amazon. Economical buy
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Grips and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was well done and the products were easy to use. Tape Strips were appropriately fitted along with the spray solution all of which made the install of the grips a clean and easy. The grips feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Cavanah

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit.
customer_reviews.text: Good grips with everything I needed to install them. Even beginners can change their grips with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: tlshil

customer_reviews.title: First time regripping
customer_reviews.text: Driver and 3 hybrid needed new grips. I've never done this before so I bought this re-griping kit. Took a little longer than I thought, but the results were good. Have used the clubs at least 6 days and I am satisfied so far. I still have 11 grips left over to use as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: john lawlor jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that's easy to install. I was able to install with confidence after watching a couple of YouTube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Great grips!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install if you use the solvent correctly. Don’t try to save any solvent use as much as needed there is plenty
customer_reviews.author: Mark Christophe Voyles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to I stall. Good instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Good value! Grips, solvent, knife, tape & rubber vise, all for one low price.
customer_reviews.author: Don Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Decent grips but cheap quality spray bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The grips are fine for the price. I would buy again. However, they don't give you enough solvent solution and the spray attachment is very cheap quality. You are better off having a better spray bottle. Happy golfing. ⛳
customer_reviews.author: aamir moinuddin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of regrips I have purchased through Amazon and this set is the better of the two. It has everything you need to get your clubs back in shape.
customer_reviews.author: History Doc

customer_reviews.title: Decent grips
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel are decent. Install was simple and included double sided tape was convenient. I got midsize, but they feel like standards. Overall, good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: vfsandman

customer_reviews.title: Not trying to be a pro. Low cost, decent grip solution for the casual player.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough install that my 12yr old and 13yr old sons did the job for me! They had only two sleeves that were casualties, they quickly figured out what mistakes were made and successfully finished regripping the rest of my set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SAPLIZE Golf Grips Standard/Midsize 13 Grips with 15 Tapes or 13 Grips with Full Regripping Kit Anti-Slip Rubber Golf Club Grips
product_meta.description:
------ SAPLIZE, smart action, smart play! ------

 

This series of rubber grips is one of the most classical models in our product family.

Bright lines on pure black color rubber make the grips appear simple and concise. Usage of unique formula rubber material improves the anti-slip characteristics. The proper hardness of the rubber gives good feeling while you holding the club and ensures the stability during your playing..

 

After-sale Service

 

 1. If you have any question about the products, please feel free to contact us.
    
 2. Your feedback and review will greatly help us improve our products and services.

 

Product Details:

 

 * Color: Black Rubber with four color pattens for choice( yello/green/blue/red )
 * Size: Standard/Mid Size
 * Materials: Rubber
 * Package includes:  * Golf Grip * 13
    * Grip Tape * 15
    * 4oz Grip Solvent * 1 (Only in Full Regriping Kit Bundle)
    * Rubber Vise Clamp * 1(Only in Full Regriping Kit Bundle)
    * Golf Hook Blade * 1(Only in Full Regriping Kit Bundle)
   
    
   
   What's SAPLIZE?
   
    
   
   SAPLIZE is a brand aiming to offer great solutions to your sport needs.
   
   With more than 10 years of design and production experiences of golf grips, we are confident of serving customers with great Golf Grips.
   
   We pay much attention to customers' requirements and hope to understand better.
   
    
   
   Your any ideas are our cherished code of conducts which help us improve.
   
    
   
   ------ SAPLIZE, smart action, smart play! ------
feature_bullets: 【Grip Spec】Standard size, Round, Core φ: 0.6", Length=10.6", Weight=55g
【Design】Concise Design Style. Classic debossing patten with very simple, light color arrow and lines printed on pure black rubber
【Material】Superior rubber of special formula. Abrasion resistant, anti-slip, high stability and good shock-absorption. Suitable for all-weather conditions
【After-sales service】100% No-risk Money Back Offer. Any issue you met, please feel free to contact us
